nodes.text: A lupine species of bipedal sentients lived on a planet in the Outer Rim Territories, near the border of Galactic Republic space. They had lupine lower legs, with high ankle joints and three-clawed feet. The species had pointed ears and gray skin, with red eyes. They had sharp teeth and typically wore hoods.

During the Mandalorian Wars, their homeworld was conquered by Mandalorian forces under control of Rohlan Dyre, a commander of the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders who was trying to escape the army so as to discover the true motivation of the Mandalorian expansion. He killed many of the species while making his escape. A couple of members were caught on the surveillance tapes of Eejee Vamm while the Duros was searching for Gorman Vandrayk. Later, at least one member of the species was part of the Taris Resistance after the planet was conquered by the Mandalorians. He was present when Shel Jelavan attacked Zayne Carrick on his arrival at the Resistance base.
This species was created by Dustin Weaver and has appeared as a background species in three issues of the Knights of the Old Republic comic series.
